#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
char a[26]={'a','b','c','d','e','f','g','h','i','j','k','l','m','n','o','p','q','r','s','t','u','v','w','x','y','z'};
int main()
{
	int i,j,t,n;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%d",&n);
		j=n%25;
		if(j!=0)
		{
			for(i=j;i>=0;i--)
			printf("%c",a[i]);
		}
		n/=25;
		while(n--)
		{
			for(i=25;i>=0;i--)
			printf("%c",a[i]);
		}
		printf("\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
